TopicTitle: KSP 1 Running Horrible on rtx 3050 ti laptop

Articles.Content:
Hello,

My hp Victus laptop is running ksp really slow (5-6 fps) but I have a rtx 3050 ti laptop. I have had the same issue with War thunder and I forgot what I did and it worked but I have uninstalled the CPU graphic thingy I have restarted my pc, get the latest driver, set all my settings to be using the graphics card but nothing works.

The sooner I can get this fixed the better. Also I don't want to mess with the BIOS or much of the driver stuff if necessary

I have already searched for my problem and similar things come up but when I try them they don't work.

my specs are:

Ryzon 7 5800H with Radeon Graphics,
16 gigs of ram,
512 Samsung ssd,
and rtx 3050 ti laptop GPU

I have a gaming laptop, which has lower specs than you, but t have no problems with War thunder.

I think it Maybe the hardware issues or the GPU drivers problem.

Edited November 18, 2023 by yinxin
